name: The Ride
description:
A personal experience game that attempts to convey how it feels to Ride. Make you feel the freedom that I feel. Show you the world through my eyes for a brief time.

WSAD or Arrow Keys to move, Mouse to look and pick up bike gear.

Audio:

  • Ash Ball - Portfolio Link.
  • Chris Ware - Portfolio Link.
  • Johan Deecke - Portfolio Link

Bike Gear Assets:

  • Peter Buck - Blog Link

Credit: One of the two background song's - Eleven8 - Colours Of Distance - Does not belong to me.

Post Mortem: https://feenikxfire.wordpress.com/2016/10/05/the-ride-post-mortem/
